results.description: Egyptian sides Pyramids and Al Masry will face each other in the group stage of the Confederation Cup.
results.title: Egyptian sides drawn together in Confederation Cup

results.description: November's African football news in brief.
results.title: November's African football news in brief

results.description: Goalkeeper Mohamed Al-Forgany is recalled to the Libya squad after an eight-year absence.
results.title: Libya recall keeper after eight year absence

results.description: Former Tanzania Football Federation president Jamal Malinzi is banned for 10 years by Fifa for misappropriation of funds and falsifying documents.
results.shortTitle: More problems for ex-Tanzania FA boss Malinzi
results.title: Jamal Malinzi: More problems for ex-Tanzania FA boss

results.description: Senegal's Lamine Ndiaye is appointed as coach of Guinea's Horoya on a three-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Senegal's Ndiaye appointed new Horoya coach
results.title: Senegal's Lamine Ndiaye appointed new Horoya coach

results.description: Former Stoke City winger Ramadan Sobhi helps hosts Egypt to a 3-2 win over Ghana at the Under-23 Africa Cup of Nations.
results.shortTitle: Sobhi guides Egypt's U23 to win over Ghana
results.title: Ramadan Sobhi guides Egypt's U23 to win over Ghana

results.description: Morocco striker Abderrazak Hamdallah retires from internationals after latest omission by coach Vahid Halilhodzic
results.title: Morocco's Abderrazak Hamdallah retires from internationals

results.description: Botswana coach Adel Amrouche excludes four players from his latest squad after they were caught drinking at a training camp.
results.title: Botswana coach Adel Amrouche omits quartet caught drinking

results.description: England-based Macauley Bonne withdraws from the Zimbabwe squad days after getting his passport allowing him to play in Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.
results.shortTitle: Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad
results.title: Macauley Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad on 'medical grounds'

results.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers' winger Adama Traore withdraws from Spain squad with an injury.
results.shortTitle: Injured Traore pulls out of Spain squad
results.title: Wolves' Adama Traore forced to withdraw from Spain squad

results.description: Nigeria emerge as 'favourites' to host the first Fifa Under-20 Women's World Cup in Africa, according to the Nigeria Football Federation (NFF).
results.shortTitle: Nigeria 'favourites' in race to host U20 Women's WC
results.title: Under-20 Women's World Cup: Nigeria 'favourites' in the race to host 2020 event

altText: Nigeria be runners-up for di 2014 Under-20 Women's World Cup
Nigeria were runners-up at the 2014 Under-20 Women's World Cup

results.description: Guinean champions Horoya sack their coach Didier Gomes da Rosa for failing to meet the club's African Champions League target of reaching the semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Horoya sack coach Gomes da Rosa
results.title: Guinea's Horoya sack coach for failing to achieve African Champions League target

results.description: Yacine Brahimi is left out of Algeria's squad for the defending champions' 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers against Zambia and Botswana.
results.shortTitle: Brahimi left out of Algeria squad
results.title: Brahimi left out as Belmadi makes six changes to Algeria squad

results.description: Ivory Coast surprise Nigeria 1-0 in the Group B opener at the U23 Africa Cup of Nations in Egypt - the continent's Olympic football qualifying tournament.
results.shortTitle: Ivory Coast shock Nigeria in U23 Group B opener
results.title: 2019 U23 Africa Cup of Nations: Ivory Coast shock Nigeria in Group B opener

results.description: History is made in Morocco where VAR (Video Assistant Referee) technology is used in an African domestic match for the first time.
results.shortTitle: VAR used in domestic African match for first time
results.title: Morocco becomes first African country to use VAR in domestic match

results.description: Nigeria striker Obafemi Martins, 35, says he has no immediate plans to retire from football and will not rush to decide his next destination.
results.title: Obafemi Martins: Nigeria star not contemplating retirement yet

results.description: FC Porto forward Moussa Marega, who has been nursing an injury, is not included in Mali's squad for the upcoming 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.
results.shortTitle: Injured Marega out of Mali squad
results.title: Moussa Marega: Injured forward left out of Mali squad for Nations Cup qualifiers

results.description: Hosts Egypt beat Mali 1-0 as the continent's Olympic football qualifying tournament - the U-23 Africa Cup of Nations - gets underway in Cairo.
results.shortTitle: Hosts Egypt get U23 Afcon off to winning start
results.title: U-23 Africa Cup of Nations: Hosts Egypt open with win over Mali as Cameroon and Ghana draw

results.description: Southampton under-23 boss and former Tunisia captain Radhi Jaidi to coach US team Hartford Athletic on a 12-month secondment.
results.shortTitle: Former Tunisia captain Jaidi to coach in USA
results.title: Former Tunisia captain Radhi Jaidi to coach in USA

results.description: Senegal international Mbaye Diagne is fined and dropped by Club Bruges for missing a penalty in the European Champions League.
